participant_abstract.sent: We began by talking about the things that we needed to cover in the meeting.
The UI and I showed our prototype, discussing various things like where the voice recognition technology was to be placed.
Then we received some information from "finances" and we were over budget, so to my dismay we had to get rid of our solar technology.
That put us ahead of budget so we were happy.
We then evaluated the product in whole.

participant_problems.sent: It is still quite unclear were we go from here.
